Fruits.name: Apple
Fruits.description: Apples are rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and have been associated with many health benefits.

Fruits.name: Strawberry
Fruits.description: Strawberries' high levels of vitamin C and other antioxidants help reduce the risk of serious health issues.

Fruits.name: Mango
Fruits.description: Mango is rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and it has been associated with many health benefits.

Fruits.name: Grapes
Fruits.description: Grapes are rich in nutrients, boost immunity, provide antioxidants, and promote better sleep.

Fruits.name: Avocado
Fruits.description: Avocados are an excellent source of beneficial fats and vitamins.

Fruits.name: Guava
Fruits.description: Guava is rich in lycopene, a powerful antioxidant, and vitamin C.

Fruits.name: Papaya
Fruits.description: Papayas contain high levels of antioxidants that reduce inflammation.

Fruits.name: Persimmon
Fruits.description: Persimmons are a good source of vitamins and dietary fiber.
